name: Hiba Reyes

projects.title: Suitable tree planting areas in the City of San Diego
City of Miami Beach Sea Level Rise
projects.description: A 3D scene of buildings in Miami Beach that are affected by sea level rise and the year of inundation that the building may be affected. This analysis was completed in ArcGIS Pro.

projects.title: Torrey Pines Data Dashboard
projects.description: Dashboard created for the non-profit Ocean Discovery Institute. This Dashboard was made as a tool for the students to study the tree health of Torrey Pines reserve.

projects.title: Torrey Pines Survey123
projects.description: Survey123 created for the non-profit Ocean Discovery Institute. This survey was made by using the tool Survey123 Connect.

projects.title: Plant coverage StoryMap
projects.description: StoryMap with a web map using the tools from ArcGIS. Project created for the non-profit Ocean Discovery Institute.

aboutpara: When I'm not making web maps,You'll find me exploring nature through hiking, SUP, kayaking, and snorkeling, often visiting National Parks. I have a passion for photography and enjoy capturing moments during my adventures.My favorite thing is spending quality time with my dog, Maya.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
